Title: Wall Collider
Hint: Leave the room through the wall, click 'Found It!' button, click the wall
Reason: Developer forgot to add collider on the wall

Title: Player Rotate
Desc: Player rotate when collide with wall
Hint: Move to the wall and walk along the wall, player would rotate incorrectly, click 'Found It!' and click player
Reason: Rotation restriction is not added on player

Title: Door Collider
Hint: Leave the room through the door, click 'Found It!' button, click the player
Reason: Developer forgot to add collider on the door

Title: Flowers Sort Order
Desc: Flowers show on top of player
Hint: In town, walk on the flowers the flowers would show on top of player, find bug on player
Reason: Sorting order of the flower is higher than player

Title: Dialogue
Desc: Player can move while in dialogue
Hint: In town, walk while talking to the villager, find bug on player
Reason: Player movement should be disable in dialogue

Title: Chest
Desc: Chest can be opened more than once
Hint: In town, open chest multiple times, find bug on the extra sword you get
Reason: Chest should not get trigger again after picked item from it

Title: Too Many Inventory
Hint: Get lots of apples from the town

Title: Inventory Usage Bound
Desc: Player use inventory that does not exist
Hint: When you only have, say 2 items in your inventory, press 3
Reason: Should take care of the edge case, when player press number lager than the inventory, ignore it

Title: Too Much HP
Desc: Apple heals more than max hp
Hint: Eat apple when you have full HP, find bug on player
Reason: Should limit the player's hp to never lager than initial HP

Title: Don't Die
Desc: Player's hp gets to 0 but still alive
Hint: Make player's hp to 0, find bug on player
Reason: Player dead logic does not get triggered when HP is 0

Title: Stone Infinite Attack
Desc: Stone keeps attacking player for too many times
Hint: Get player hit by a stone and get killed by it, find bug on player
Reason: After projectile hit a target, it should destory itself
